comment: Hey Tom here‚Äôs an odd question but have you ever had deer meat

‚ÄúAs far as I know‚Äù. That sounds concerning but ok cool
Well, I can't say difinitively. I've eaten a lot of processed meat.
Who knows what could be in sometimes that I don't know about.
I have not, to the best of my knowledge, intentionally eaten deer meat.
Thats...true...but I dont want to think about it.
Deer has to be processed on its own. Only then could it be added to stuff like beef or whatever. And I‚Äôve never known of anywhere or anyone that cuts deer or beef with the other
Though I guess if you‚Äôve never had it or have never been told you‚Äôre having it, you‚Äôd take the difference in taste as part of the meal. But deer does taste different

I wouldn't be opposed to trying it.
I was just wondering. Deer season around here, I don‚Äôt know for sure the timing, but it brings people making deer stew, deer jerky, and (wait for it) ‚Äúsloppy doe‚Äôs‚Äù
Even better is that it‚Äôs the guys they shoot for meat. Females are only killed if they‚Äôre shot accidentally

my dad made em when I was a kid, but

I guess it comes down to finding a balance to working in the present of the webcomic and the future of it.
